data.eml:eml: Two species of Ceradocus collected from coastal areas in Japan, with description of a new species (Crustacea: Amphipoda: Maeridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ariyama, Hiroyuki (2019): Two species of Ceradocus collected from coastal areas in Japan, with description of a new species (Crustacea: Amphipoda: Maeridae). Zootaxa 4658 (2): 297-316, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4658.2.5
